argumentsSchema.title: Run a feature experiment activated by a preference.

___experimentDocumentUrl.description: URL of a document describing the experiment

___preferenceType.description: Data type of the preference that controls this experiment

___preferenceName.description: Full dotted-path of the preference that controls this experiment

___preferenceBranchType.descript: Controls whether the default or user value of the preference is modified

___slug.description: Unique identifier for this branch of the experiment

___value.description: Value to set the preference to for this branch

___ratio.description: Ratio of users who should be grouped into this branch
